content: uptown bag abbreviations beg - beginning chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch blo - back loop only space - space materials list 8 oz black worsted weight yarn 2 5 oz white worsted weight yarn two 2 5 black buttons magnetic snap four 1 5 d rings 1/2 yd 1/4 cording size g hook base row 1 with black chain 31 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in chain across 30 single_crochet row 2-8 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across 30 single_crochet turn to work in end of row chain 1 single_crochet in ends of next 7 row 2 single_crochet in end of last row single_crochet in first 29 free loops of foundation chain 2 single_crochet in last free loop working in end of row single_crochet in ends of next 7 row 2 single_crochet in end of last row single_crochet in first 29 single_crochet of row 8 2 single_crochet in last single_crochet of row 8 join to beg single_crochet to join chain 1 turn 80 single_crochet body round 1 working in blo single_crochet in each single_crochet around 80 single_crochet rnds 2-34 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet around 80sc round 35 repeat round 2 finish off weave in loose ends overlay row 1 with white chain 81 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in chain across 80 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet *single_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * across 40 single_crochet 40 double_crochet row 3-12 repeat row 2 finish off leaving a long end for sewing match short ends of overlay lay band flat sew short ends together using a flat weave handles make 2 row 1 with black chain 71 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across 70 single_crochet row 2-4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across 70 single_crochet row 5 do not chain 1 turn slip_stitch in next 10 single_crochet lay length of 1/4 inch cording along center of strip between sts 11 and 60 fold strip in half lengthwise around cording working through both thicknesses single_crochet in next 50 single_crochet slip_stitch in remaining 10 single_crochet finishing slip overlay into purse body line up with the top edge of both whipstitch together fold overlay to outside purse body sew button to front and one to back install magnetic snap thread each end of handle through a d-ring stitch closed sew handles to inside of purse body attach buttons one to the front and one to the back every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l
